3.2三家者以《雍》徹。¶
子曰：¶

3.3子曰：¶

如禮何？¶

如樂何？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_003-4a>¶

# src: LY 03.04; tr. CH
3.4林放問禮之本。¶
子曰：¶
「大哉問！¶
禮，
與其奢也，¶	KR1a0012_010:25a:4:7:3,KR1a0033_006:42a:7:5:2,KR1a0034_003:55b:5:3:0,KR1a0041_062:5b:4:10:0,KR1a0048_017:9a:8:17:106,KR1a0058_006:39b:5:3:1,KR1a0059_011:14a:3:15:0,KR1a0064_013:19b:8:17:1,KR1a0071_002:74a:5:8:105,KR1a0075_014:35b:7:16:0,KR1a0077_008:42a:1:7:0,KR1a0078_001:119b:5:16:42,KR1a0081_006:46a:1:19:0,KR1a0088_006:6b:4:11:0,KR1a0091_015:14a:7:38:0,KR1a0092_008:70a:3:4:2,KR1a0102_015:31b:3:8:0,KR1a0118_007:33b:8:18:0,KR1a0135_009:24b:7:8:3,KR1a0139_043:20a:2:12:224,KR1a0139_068:10a:6:15:94,KR1a0153_004:31a:6:28:1,KR1c0009_005:13a:2:9:16,KR1c0012_012:3b:3:3:0,KR1c0012_012:7a:1:6:0,KR1c0012_013:8a:8:17:0,KR1c0015_003:19a:7:21:60,KR1c0017_010:1b:9:9:0,KR1c0022_009:2a:7:12:1,KR1c0028_005:23b:1:9:136,KR1c0030_007:21b:2:9:103,KR1c0035_005:21b:2:9:99,KR1c0036_011:2b:6:11:0,KR1c0036_024:13b:7:18:14,KR1c0044_008:36a:6:11:136,KR1d0005_004:8a:2:25:1,KR1d0049_001:2b:3:7:3,KR1d0051_081:5a:2:13:2,KR1d0057_021:19a:2:3:0,KR1d0060_004:25b:5:31:2,KR1d0076_004:7b:5:9:2,KR1d0086_076:27a:8:13:0,KR1e0006_015:21a:6:19:1,KR1e0007_007:5b:8:22:1,KR1f0010_004:45a:5:28:288,KR1g0004_003:2a:1:13:8,KR1g0009_002:2a:4:13:2,KR1g0009_005:2a:6:10:2,KR1h0004_003:1a:18:2:3,KR1h0005_002:2a:2:13:0,KR1h0006_002:4a:6:1:7,KR1h0006_002:4a:9:33:7,KR1h0007_003:4a:9:20:8,KR1h0007_003:4b:4:8:8,KR1h0012_002:2b:7:13:8,KR1h0012_002:3a:3:15:9,KR1h0012_004:20b:6:1:68,KR1h0015_002:2a:3:31:4,KR1h0017_003:6a:1:13:22,KR1h0017_003:6a:7:19:23,KR1h0017_003:6b:2:19:23,KR1h0017_003:7b:1:16:25,KR1h0017_003:8a:7:14:27,KR1h0019_001:26b:7:13:83,KR1h0019_002:85b:9:2:260,KR1h0020_001:15a:1:13:77,KR1h0021_000:28a:3:13:131,KR1h0024_007:2b:2:11:4,KR1h0024_007:3a:2:34:4,KR1h0026_002:2b:5:13:11,KR1h0028_005:6a:1:2:15,KR1h0032_000:5a:4:2:50,KR1h0032_003:2a:7:2:6,KR1h0032_003:2b:2:8:7,KR1h0034_004:40a:2:24:82,KR1h0034_005:5b:7:2:15,KR1h0034_007:31b:2:14:95,KR1h0038_006:4a:1:2:15,KR1h0039_001:33b:1:13:146,KR1h0039_004:42b:9:13:160,KR1h0039_005:37b:5:13:103,KR1h0043_003:7b:3:2:14,KR1h0043_003:7b:8:17:15,KR1h0043_007:55b:6:22:92, 寧儉；¶
喪，

3.6季氏旅於泰山。¶

對曰：¶
「不能。」¶
子曰：¶
「嗚呼！¶
曾謂泰山不如林放乎？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_003-7a>¶	KR1d0086_038:15b:2:7:79,KR1e0003_005:2a:12:24:5,KR1e0036_005:3a:4:4:1,KR1e0071_007:10b:4:23:2,KR1e0094_007:8b:6:8:13,KR1g0009_002:2b:6:5:2,KR1g0014_001:12b:5:13:1,KR1h0004_003:1a:32:1:5,KR1h0006_002:5a:7:6:9,KR1h0006_002:5b:4:42:9,KR1h0007_003:5a:8:4:10,KR1h0007_003:5b:5:6:10,KR1h0008_001:5b:4:4:36,KR1h0012_002:3b:10:4:12,KR1h0012_002:4a:4:4:13,KR1h0015_002:2b:6:10:4,KR1h0017_003:9b:11:4:35,KR1h0017_003:10b:4:9:37,KR1h0017_003:11a:8:19:38,KR1h0021_000:29a:1:4:135,KR1h0021_000:29a:5:1:136,KR1h0028_005:8a:7:5:19,KR1h0034_005:8a:5:5:19,KR1h0043_003:10b:8:5:18,KR2a0007_025:9a:5:36:2,KR2b0007_044:20b:4:2:2,KR2b0017_067:13b:6:9:1,KR2b0037_021:17a:5:14:0,KR2h0002_010:21b:1:1:47,KR2m0009_069:9b:8:4:77,KR2n0011_213:5b:1:19:12,KR2o0020_017:94a:8:34:142,KR2o0020_017:94b:2:2:142,KR2o0020_042:33b:2:1:97,KR3j0118_001:13b:3:8:14,KR3k0003_030:19b:2:20:2,KR3k0013_808:15a:1:9:5,KR3k0051_020:11b:1:3:2,KR3k0051_020:11b:2:3:2,KR3k0051_020:11b:4:20:2,KR4e0005_019:25a:8:9:6,KR4e0186_007:35a:4:2:16,KR4f0038_047:6b:6:14:1,KR4h0122_013:1b:5:6:3,KR4h0134_014:34a:2:6:76,KR5h0041_007:002a:7:9:1,KR5h0041_018:086b:3:11:87,KR5i0105_005:05p059a:11:1:53,KR6q0200_025:0407b:2:8:2

下而飲。¶
其爭也君子。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_003-8a>¶	KR1c0002_014:11b:7:28:10,KR1c0004_021:58a:7:21:10,KR1c0009_016:17b:2:3:6,KR1c0015_006:10b:8:37:22,KR1c0017_025:30b:7:10:46,KR1c0022_021:35b:8:3:20,KR1c0023_023:29b:2:6:10,KR1c0028_016:38a:4:9:132,KR1c0030_018:32b:2:17:73,KR1c0044_019:41a:6:7:87,KR1d0034_002:13b:4:5:6,KR1d0052_047:1a:177:1:22,KR1d0053_062:17b:2:16:1,KR1d0053_062:18a:1:29:1,KR1d0054_020:11a:5:18:2,KR1d0055_031:17a:2:2:1,KR1d0057_146:19a:6:16:0,KR1d0057_158:28b:6:11:0,KR1d0057_158:29a:4:6:0,KR1d0057_158:30b:8:17:0,KR1d0057_158:31a:3:15:0,KR1d0057_158:32b:6:9:0,KR1d0059_010:50a:7:19:28,KR1d0059_010:50b:1:39:28,KR1d0060_030:13b:1:20:7,KR1d0060_030:13b:6:17:7,KR1d0061_007:10b:5:5:2,KR1d0068_075:59b:5:10:98,KR1d0086_013:15a:6:15:29,KR1g0005_007:5a:8:3:34,KR1h0004_003:1a:38:1:6,KR1h0005_002:3a:2:5:0,KR1h0006_002:6a:3:7:9,KR1h0006_002:6b:6:5:9,KR1h0006_002:6b:7:9:9,KR1h0006_002:6b:8:34:9,KR1h0007_003:6a:7:2:11,KR1h0007_003:6b:2:6:11,KR1h0007_003:6b:2:30:11,KR1h0012_002:4a:6:19:14,KR1h0016_008:4b:9:4:12,KR1h0016_008:5a:7:7:12,KR1h0017_003:11b:8:19:40,KR1h0017_003:11b:11:15:41,KR1h0017_003:12a:2:15:41,KR1h0017_003:12a:5:10:41,KR1h0017_003:13a:8:7:45,KR1h0017_003:13b:1:9:46,KR1h0019_001:28a:3:19:89,KR1h0020_001:16a:4:19:83,KR1h0021_000:29b:1:19:137,KR1h0021_000:29b:7:4:138,KR1h0024_007:3b:4:7:4,KR1h0024_007:3b:6:16:4,KR1h0026_002:4a:5:19:17,KR1h0028_005:9a:5:19:21,KR1h0028_005:9b:5:10:22,KR1h0028_005:9b:8:2:22,KR1h0031_008:4b:7:14:18,KR1h0038_006:6a:5:19:21,KR1h0038_006:7a:6:20:22,KR1h0043_003:12a:4:19:20,KR2k0036_021:6a:5:10:6,KR2k0052_045:47a:5:4:730,KR2k0052_045:47a:7:22:732,KR2k0052_045:129a:5:4:2020,KR2k0052_045:129a:7:22:2022,KR2m0001_082:12a:3:17:2,KR2m0017_058:18a:4:20:86,KR2m0037_014:16a:3:10:178,KR3a0031_006:5b:6:5:2,KR3a0047_042:24a:1:18:9,KR3a0059_032:41a:4:19:3,KR3a0059_032:41b:1:17:3,KR3a0064_029:22a:3:11:3,KR3a0064_029:22a:7:5:3,KR3a0080_048:13b:5:19:90,KR3a0080_048:14a:2:17:90,KR3a0087_020:11a:5:2:2,KR3j0021_008:21a:7:20:1,KR3j0023_002:6a:5:6:3,KR3k0008_085:14a 3.8子夏問曰：¶

何謂也？」¶
子曰：¶

3.9子曰：¶
「夏禮，¶

足，
則吾能徵之矣。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_003-11a>¶	KR1c0012_041:24a:2:3:2,KR1d0053_003:19a:3:41:1,KR1e0045_008:2a:1:12:2,KR1g0009_002:4a:1:11:2,KR1h0004_003:1a:59:2:8,KR1h0006_002:9b:2:31:11,KR1h0006_002:9b:3:13:11,KR1h0007_003:8a:9:1:12,KR1h0007_003:8b:3:31:12,KR1h0015_002:3b:8:10:4,KR1h0019_001:29b:9:11:93,KR1h0043_003:15b:1:12:28,KR2a0001_400:1111a:14:2:1110,KR2a0002_045:22a:5:22:1,KR2a0007_030:13a:6:8:2,KR2d0023_007:7b:7:13:2,KR2m0009_182:1b:2:17:2,KR3a0080_040:9b:6:11:54,KR3a0093_003:29a:4:11:3,KR3k0025_074:1b:4:1:2,KR3k0055_159:20b:3:18:5,KR4h0132_621:20b:1:8:3,KR4h0132_621:52b:1:8:6

# src: LY 03.10; tr. CH
3.10子曰：¶

3.11或問禘之說。¶
子曰：¶
「不知也；¶

3.12祭如在，¶

# src: LY 03.13; tr. CH

「『與其媚於奧，¶	KR1h0004_003:13a:7:1:12,KR3a0108_012:12b:8:1:21,KR6q0472_006:0111c:9:3:56,KR6s0014_003:0944c:2:13:53

子曰：¶
「不然；¶

# src: LY 03.15; tr. CH

# src: LY 03.17; tr. CH
3.17子貢欲去告朔之餼羊。¶
子曰：¶
「賜也！¶

3.18子曰：¶

人以為諂也。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_003-20a>¶	KR1a0012_009:52a:6:12:7,KR1a0047_025:5a:8:13:0,KR1d0086_082:7a:4:1:67,KR1g0005_007:6a:7:5:40,KR1g0009_002:6b:5:7:2,KR1h0004_003:13a:38:1:17,KR1h0006_002:16b:4:7:19,KR1h0015_002:6a:7:27:4,KR1h0017_034:26b:1:10:99,KR1h0021_000:34b:8:7:158,KR1h0026_002:11a:4:7:39,KR1h0028_005:22a:6:7:53,KR1h0034_005:21a:1:7:53,KR1h0034_005:21a:5:30:54,KR1h0034_005:21b:1:3:54,KR1h0038_006:15a:7:7:53,KR1h0039_005:26b:6:5:69,KR1h0043_003:31a:8:7:52,KR1h0043_003:31b:2:25:53,KR2f0039_286:9b:4:8:2,KR3a0031_006:6a:8:13:2,KR3a0031_006:6b:1:4:2,KR3a0059_012:1a:5:9:2,KR3a0079_006:32a:2:7:8,KR3a0105_094:5a:5:3:57,KR3k0025_068:34b:2:8:22,KR4d0045_024:14a:4:17:12,KR6k0217_002:0662c:9:18:17

# src: LY 03.19; tr. CH
3.19定公問：¶
「君使臣，¶
臣事君，¶
如之何？」¶

3.20子曰：¶
「《關雎》、¶

# src: LY 03.21; tr. CH
3.21哀公問社於宰我。¶

使民戰栗。」¶	KR1a0102_011:44b:8:11:0,KR1a0102_011:45a:3:14:0,KR1a0121_002:10b:4:4:1,KR1c0006_002:10a:2:5:5,KR1c0012_003:7a:1:18:0,KR1c0012_003:7a:3:14:0,KR1d0022_003:2b:7:9:1,KR1d0084_091:8a:8:5:3,KR1d0086_038:6b:8:7:7,KR1e0003_006:17a:2:2:2,KR1e0003_013:10b:12:25:3,KR1e0004_005:29a:7:39:1,KR1e0036_013:16a:8:32:1,KR1e0047_028:26a:5:9:2,KR1e0056_005:75b:7:18:1,KR1e0064_011:35a:4:6:187,KR1e0070_001:24a:3:8:11,KR1e0071_015:60b:7:25:2,KR1e0074_016:34b:1:10:2,KR1g0009_002:7b:6:5:2,KR1g0009_002:8a:1:7:2,KR1h0004_003:13a:55:2:20,KR1h0005_002:7b:2:12:0,KR1h0005_002:7b:4:14:0,KR1h0006_002:17b:5:5:22,KR1h0006_002:17b:7:2:22,KR1h0006_002:18a:6:2:22,KR1h0006_002:18a:7:29:22,KR1h0006_002:18a:8:40:22,KR1h0006_002:18b:1:39:22,KR1h0006_002:18b:7:12:22,KR1h0006_002:18b:7:23:22,KR1h0006_002:18b:7:39:22,KR1h0007_003:18a:5:5:21,KR1h0007_003:18a:6:20:21,KR1h0007_003:18b:3:30:21,KR1h0007_003:18b:5:30:21,KR1h0012_002:12b:1:5:39,KR1h0015_002:7a:2:1:4,KR1h0016_008:17b:5:3:26,KR1h0017_003:37a:2:5:129,KR1h0017_003:37a:10:16:131,KR1h0017_003:37b:2:3:131,KR1h0017_003:38a:1:3:132,KR1h0017_003:38a:9:5:133,KR1h0017_003:38b:6:5:134,KR1h0020_000:2a:8:14:4,KR1h0020_001:20b:10:5:104,KR1h0020_001:21a:5:5:105,KR1h0021_000:36a:7:5:164,KR1h0021_000:36b:1:8:165,KR1h0024_007:8b:3:21:4,KR1h0026_002:12a:6:5:45,KR1h0026_002:12b:3:14:46,KR1h0026_002:12b:5:1:46,KR1h0028_005:24b:2:6:59,KR1h0030_003:4b:4:30:5,KR1h0034_005:23b:2:6:59,KR1h0036_002:5a:7:4:12,KR1h0038_006:16b:2:6:59,KR1h0039_003:34b:6:18:187,KR1h0040_002:39a:1:8:113,KR1h0043_003:34a:7:6:58,KR1h0043_017:39a:2:35:96,KR1j0003_002:3a:14:20:3,KR1j0012_010:8a:3:20:22,KR2b0017_044:6a:4:2:1,KR2b0017_068:9a:7:18:9,KR2d0005_010:29a:2:21:1,KR2d0005_010:29a:6:4:1,KR2g0001_005:3b:4:5:1,KR2g0024_067:8b:2:7:9,KR2o0015_016:1b:3:12:7,KR2o0015_017:3b:6:8:7,KR2o0015_017:4a:1:15:7,KR3a0047_025:39b:8:5:22,KR3a0047_025:40a:8:3:22,KR3a0063_005:39b:4:13:1,KR3a0064_002:10b:2:1:28,KR3a0064_035:17a:1:15:3,KR3a0108_012:19a:4:5:29,KR3j0020_001:8a:4:5:1,KR3j0020_001:8a:5:5:1,KR3j0029_0 # src: LY 03.23; tr. CH
3.23子語魯大師樂，¶
曰：¶
「樂其可知也：¶	KR1d0057_091:35b:6:2:0,KR1d0057_111:3a:6:16:0,KR1d0086_087:11a:6:1:0,KR1g0009_002:8b:5:10:2,KR1h0004_003:13a:79:1:23,KR1h0006_002:21b:6:8:24,KR1h0006_002:22a:2:42:24,KR1h0007_003:20b:9:8:23,KR1h0007_003:21a:7:12:23,KR1h0012_002:15a:5:8:43,KR1h0015_002:8a:4:28:4,KR1h0017_003:40b:8:8:142,KR1h0020_001:22a:3:8:108,KR1h0021_000:37b:9:8:168,KR1h0021_000:38a:4:15:169,KR1h0024_007:9b:6:26:4,KR1h0026_002:14b:1:8:49,KR1h0028_005:29b:3:8:68,KR1h0034_005:28a:1:8:68,KR1h0038_006:19b:5:8:68,KR1h0039_003:8a:4:8:53,KR1h0043_003:40a:6:8:67,KR2a0001_400:1112a:2:1:1111,KR2a0002_045:22a:8:26:1,KR2a0004_047:20a:5:7:1,KR2a0009_070:50b:2:10:6,KR2c0021_086:94b:3:3:9,KR2d0005_031:17b:8:8:1,KR2d0006_100:18b:3:2:4,KR2f0039_128:30a:8:12:95,KR2g0001_004:12a:2:20:1,KR2m0009_128:13a:6:8:2,KR2m0014_158:17b:2:12:201,KR2n0011_167:13b:6:7:45,KR3a0059_024:44b:7:2:7,KR3a0080_043:1a:7:10:3,KR3a0111_022:10a:8:7:2,KR3j0050_002:4a:8:18:0,KR3k0008_061:17a:7:2:17,KR3k0012_564:2a:12:10:4,KR3k0012_999:2a:12:10:12574,KR3k0013_856:6a:8:9:2,KR3k0025_078:2b:4:20:2,KR3k0030_310:4a:1:32:2,KR3k0050_112:14a:6:16:4,KR3k0050_113:60b:6:6:24,KR3k0055_189:49b:8:3:11,KR4d0058_015:14a:8:9:14
始作，¶
翕如也；¶
從之，¶
純如也，¶
皦如也，¶
繹如也，¶
以成。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_003-27a>¶

謂《武》，¶
「盡美矣，¶

# src: LY 03.26; tr. CH
3.26子曰：¶
「居上不寬，¶	KR1h0004_003:13a:103:1:26,KR3j0082_008:11b:6:9:3
